attributes.action: order the Speaker to eject any MP who does not answer a question in the House directly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our 2 Houses of Government have become spin. In any PMQ the PM answers questions that were not asked.

I petition now, that the Speaker rejects 'fluff' answers. The questions MUST be answered, no matter who is in Government. This is what we elect people for.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
